title: APIS (APIS) One Day Volume Tops $3.00 Million
content: APIS (CURRENCY:APIS) traded down 3.4% against the U.S. dollar during the 24-hour period ending at 17:00 PM ET on May 26th. One APIS token can now be bought for about $0.0117 or 0.00000153 BTC on popular cryptocurrency exchanges including  IDEX and Bit-Z. APIS has a total market cap of $0.00 and $3.00 million worth of APIS was traded on exchanges in the last day. Over the last seven days, APIS has traded 41.7% higher  against the U.S. dollar.    Here’s how related cryptocurrencies have performed over the last day:    Get APIS alerts:     Ripple (XRP) traded up 4.3% against the dollar and now trades at $0.64 or 0.00008407 BTC.  Stellar (XLM) traded up 4.2% against the dollar and now trades at $0.30 or 0.00003914 BTC.  IOTA (MIOTA) traded up 0.9% against the dollar and now trades at $1.89 or 0.00024749 BTC.  TRON (TRX) traded up 5.3% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0610 or 0.00000799 BTC.  NEO (NEO) traded 3.8% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $56.56 or 0.00740923 BTC.  Tether (USDT) traded 1.1% lower  against the dollar and now trades at $0.99 or 0.00012957 BTC.  VeChain (VEN) traded 9.5% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $3.72 or 0.00048676 BTC.  Binance Coin (BNB) traded 4.8% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $14.71 or 0.00192636 BTC.  Ontology (ONT) traded up 10.4% against the dollar and now trades at $7.77 or 0.00101838 BTC.  Zilliqa (ZIL) traded up 7.7% against the dollar and now trades at $0.12 or 0.00001554 BTC.   About APIS      APIS’s total supply is 9,520,000,000 tokens. The official website for APIS is apisplatform.io . The official message board for APIS is medium.com/apisplatform . APIS’s official Twitter account is @Apis11Official .    APIS Token Trading    APIS can be purchased on these cryptocurrency exchanges:  IDEX and Bit-Z.  It is usually not possible to buy alternative cryptocurrencies such as APIS directly using US dollars. Investors seeking to acquire APIS should first buy Ethereum or Bitcoin using an exchange that deals in US dollars such as Coinbase , GDAX or Changelly. Investors can then use their newly-acquired Ethereum or Bitcoin to buy APIS using one of the aforementioned exchanges.
